sentences.sContent: The kids all groaned when I switched off the TV.
sentences.sCn: 我关掉电视时，孩子们都发出不满的抱怨声。

sentences.sContent: Richard’s jokes make you groan rather than laugh.
sentences.sCn: 理查德的笑话让你哭笑不得。

remMethod.val: 长大后(grown)比小孩更爱叹息(groan)

trans.tranOther: to make a long deep sound because you are in pain, upset, or disappointed, or because something is very enjoyable
a long deep sound that you make when you are in pain or do not want to do something
